analysis.description:
EmpireCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0xc936a131b1f1576ccadb8196d91ecbf108d11d01.sol#430-456) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (weiRaised >= softCap * 1000000000000000000) && gracePeriodStart == 0

EmpireCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0xc936a131b1f1576ccadb8196d91ecbf108d11d01.sol#430-456) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/11/0xc936a131b1f1576ccadb8196d91ecbf108d11d01.sol#451)

EmpireCrowdsale.getRate (/unique_chucks/11/0xc936a131b1f1576ccadb8196d91ecbf108d11d01.sol#403-424) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- duringGracePeriod = gracePeriodSet && now <= gracePeriodStart + 86400 (/unique_chucks/11/0xc936a131b1f1576ccadb8196d91ecbf108d11d01.sol#405-407)
	- gracePeriodSet = gracePeriodStart != 0 (/unique_chucks/11/0xc936a131b1f1576ccadb8196d91ecbf108d11d01.sol#405)

EmpireCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/11/0xc936a131b1f1576ccadb8196d91ecbf108d11d01.sol#430-456) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (weiRaised >= softCap * 1000000000000000000) && gracePeriodStart == 0 (/unique_chucks/11/0xc936a131b1f1576ccadb8196d91ecbf108d11d01.sol#439-442)

EmpireToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/11/0xc936a131b1f1576ccadb8196d91ecbf108d11d01.sol#311-312)
